title: Drawing, Screen Design:  "Radio Active Guard House," Front Side, 1980s
title_raw: Screen Design:  "Radio Active Guard House," Front Side
medium: Black marking pen, brush and gray wash, red and pink watercolor (?), graphite on white tracing paper.
inscribed: Inscribed in black marking pen, lower right margin:  "Radioactive Guard House"/Front side; lower center: [arrow pointing up]/cork board; lower left margin : 10.1 [encircled]; upper center:  [arrow pointing left]/?; in white crayon:  ATTENZIONE; in black marking pen: MATERIALE/RADIOATTIVO
description: Four panel screen on wheels.  At left, a tall narrow guardhouse with pitched roof and blank papers tacked to side wall.  The guardhouse is attached at right to a metal gate with red sign.  To the right, a black panel with bunny head cut out near top and stepped cut out at bottom.  On top of gate is a red dome with two red poles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Screen Design:  "Radio Active Guard House," Front Side, 1980s. Black marking pen, brush and gray wash, red and pink watercolor (?), graphite on white tracing paper.. 
Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-123
